root.str: Clear the waters with a loud declaration before splashing in or emit a sonar ping while stalking your enemies below the waves. This horn plays different sounds when above or below the water. TR use only.
This multi-purpose combat knife is built for winter environments, with a self-sharpening hardlight edge; built-in hand warmers; and a smaller, pommel-mounted blade for rope cutting and climbing.
The ABLE 3.4x optic provides more zoom depth than a standard reflex, with a green bracket reticle for mid-range precision.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 240.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Smiley Face Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 5% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 8 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 28 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Honeycomb camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Unable to capture point while cloaked.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 350 rounds.
Available as part of the Third Anniversary Bundle, this decal applies to all factions and can be applied to both armor and vehicles.
Additional Gold plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.

Apply the Rocky Tundra camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 480 rounds.
The only thing better than a robotic killing machine is a giant robotic killing machine. TR use only.
Apply the Sakura camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 shells.
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Reaver by 15%.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 20 seconds.
The New Conglomerate has defended Tawrich!
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
An imposing set of horns for a helmet.
Increases the range of the Radar Scrambler
Apply the single use Esamir Snow camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds cyan chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. TR use only.
Grenade Bandolier has been removed from your Combat Medic and its cert cost refunded.
Enables the Galaxy to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers and also places a fortification shield around the Galaxy.
all respawn locations would be blocked.
Applies a decal to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Customize your Flash with this blue antenna ball. NC use only.
Cannot deploy Citadel Shield within 300 meters of another.
Apply the Urban Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The chemical signature is even more pronounced in your area. You are close to your target.

Increases healing and revive speed by 30%. Revives MAX units at 12% health.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.
Decreases the turrets cool down period after each shot to 5.5 seconds.

Allows cortium to be used to construct a Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Tower that may be manned by allied players. NC only. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with another construction item(s).
Welcome to the New Conglomerate Embassy. Warden Hadley has been looking forward to your arrival and will give you more information about your new role.
With quick and snappy target acquisition, the Mountain RF excels at short range engagements.
Improve the Magrider's strafe speed, reverse speed, braking power and hover power.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
The Bio Lab benefit increases health regeneration while on friendly territory to all members of the controlling empire.
This bundle contains all seven T4 implants for one reduced price.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> The researchers would have been able to use this vehicle bay during an emergency. If the system had more power then we may be able to determine their destination from the last entered coordinates.

The high-temperature colorants in the continuously burning in the Spectrum Skull are neither environmentally friendly nor comfortable, but beauty knows no pain.Provides a +15% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.
Small arms fire won't damage larger vehicles. Sunderers, Lightning tanks, Main Battle Tanks, Liberators, and Galaxies are all immune.
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Non-cloaked enemies near the vehicle pulse on the map for you and any nearby allies.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 shells.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Soldier, we need combat trained pilots. Fly to the specified areas and deploy additional Storm Buoys or clear out any enemy aircraft that may threaten the research.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> You have found the researcher. She does not look well. You should see what you can learn while you still can.
Apply the Phoenix camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Apply the single use Indar Dunes camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
You have successfully purchased Daybreak Cash!
You can increase or decrease the zoom level of the minimap using the scroll wheel (default.)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 880 rounds.
The CME's high projectile velocity and good accuracy make it a very effective weapon at medium and long ranges. VS use only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Snow Aspen Forest camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Liberator by 360 seconds.
Hold breath. Use to stabilize sniper rifle scope sway for increased accuracy.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
The Flash no longer has an acquire timer.
When your shield is discharged, it instantly regenerates some ability energy.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Were you ever stationed on Oshur, prior to the war? Sometimes it's difficult to remember what life was like before all this. Almost daily scientific advancements in agriculture, medicine, or industry.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Scythe by 360 seconds.
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to Chrome. All factions can use this gear.

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.

Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 25 seconds.
This customization adds a White decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Replaces the default bolt with a low damage variant that creates a smoke screen on impact.
The Combat Clarity reflex sight allows for quick target acquisition with a lighter housing than earlier generation Nanite Systems reflex optics.
This all-rounder carbine has proven its worth defending off-planet mining colonies. All factions can use NS weapons.
You are now our warpgate, a safe area for whoever controls it and how we travel to the continents of Auraxis and other locations. Use the warpgate Terminal.

One of your most important terminals is the Equipment Terminal. This terminal can be used to resupply ammunition, change your class, or to change what weapons you are using.
The Daedalus VX60's controllable recoil and energy efficient power core interface make it an excellent choice for mid-range combat.
Maintained passive ability that heals your group for a small amount of HP

Kill enemy Infiltrators as an Infiltrator.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Okay, maybe we leaked the schematics and then stole the prototypes. Do you really want to get caught up in the details? Regardless, we've got a few new toys for you to test out in the field.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.

Stalker cloak does not drain energy as long as the infiltrator remains stationary, allowing the cloak to last indefinitely. However, stalker cloak prevents the use of the infiltrators primary weapon and regenerates slower than normal cloak.
Use the equipment terminal to switch to an Engineer.
[*source*] has invited you to join the outfit, [*guild*].
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 30%.
Reduces the duration which EMP grenades affect you by 70%.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Emerson:</font> We do have a premium elite status for operatives who put more money into their retirement fund. Basically, this membership allows you to choose a "home faction" to align yourself to. It lets you be more choosey about who your work for.
Error placing order. Please try again later.

Find a Command Terminal at your warpgate.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Bastion Asset permissions.

Bring your outfit Bastion planetside to join the battle over the continent. Acts as a flying weapons platform, fighter vehicle pad, and respawn point for your outfit.

Lasts for up to one hour.

The Focused Proton HEAT is a high explosive anti-tank plasma cannon. HEAT plasma provides a more even distribution of damage to both soft and armored targets. This cannon requires greater accuracy to be effective.

The Charged Proton ATG is a heavy-hitting anti-tank guided plasma cannon. Once a lock-on is established seeking plasma can be fired and will seek the locked target. This cannon requires a charge before it can be fired.

The demand for Auraxium remains high even after the completion of the Containment Facilities on Esamir. Nascent Expeditions, allied with the New Conglomerate, issue contracts for any soldier willing to collect the crystals unearthed by their monstrous Elysium Drills.

The explosion at the Warpgate in northeastern Esamir exposed a large structure under beneath the surface. Nanite Systems is not the only one wishing to research this buried technology; however, before we can send our scientists, the area needs to be secure. Use the Advanced Nanite Transport's construction capabilities to establish a forward operating base near The Shattered Warpgate.
